column4: Tesla executive Schwall joins Alphabet's Waymo
column5: Alphabet Inc's self-driving unit  Waymo  said on Sunday that Matthew Schwall had joined the company from Tesla Inc where he was the electric carmaker's main technical contact with U.S. safety investigators.

column4: UPDATE 1-Tesla executive Schwall joins Alphabet's Waymo
column5: May 13 Alphabet Inc's self-driving unit  Waymo  said on Sunday that Matthew Schwall had joined the company from Tesla Inc where he was the electric carmaker's main technical contact with U.S. safety investigators.

column4: Tesla executive Schwall leaves for Alphabet's Waymo - WSJ
column5: May 13 Tesla Inc's main technical contact with U.S. safety investigators  Matthew Schwall  has left the electric carmaker for Alphabet Inc's self-driving unit Waymo  the Wall Street Journal reported on Saturday  citing people familiar the decision.
